name: Lost Fragments
storyline:
Enter a realm cracked in two...
... divided between reality and memories, its shattered fragments leaving windows between worlds. Those with the power to move between them will face shadowy monsters, solve devious puzzles, and win new abilities. Confront the memory, and reforge the fragments of the past into a shining new destiny.
summary: Move between reality and memories, changing the shape of fragments of the past.
